edusign_webapp.document.storage package¶

Submodules¶

edusign_webapp.document.storage.local module¶

class edusign_webapp.document.storage.local.LocalStorage(config: dict, logger: logging.Logger)¶

Bases: edusign_webapp.doc_store.ABCStorage

Store documents locally in the fs of the backend, so that they can be consecutively signedby more than one user.

add(key: uuid.UUID, content: str)¶

Store a new document.

Parameters

  • key – UUID key identifying the document

  • content – Contents of the document, as a base64 string.

get_content(key: uuid.UUID) → Optional[str]¶

Get the content of some document identified by the key, as a base64 string.

Parameters

key – The key identifying the document.

Returns

base64 string with the contents of the document.

remove(key: uuid.UUID)¶

Remove a document from the store

Parameters

key – The key identifying the document.

update(key: uuid.UUID, content: str)¶

Update a document, usually because a new signature has been added.

Parameters

  • key – The key identifying the document.

  • content – base64 string with the contents of the new version of the document.

edusign_webapp.document.storage.s3 module¶

class edusign_webapp.document.storage.s3.S3Storage(config: dict, logger: logging.Logger)¶

Bases: edusign_webapp.doc_store.ABCStorage

Store documents in AWS’s S3 storage, so that they can be consecutively signedby more than one user.
